local_intent: Close the gripper on the white plate rim and verify a stable grasp.
assumptions: White plate is already localized from upstream steps
Robot is at a pre-grasp pose above the plate
coherence_with_global: Uses the same target (white_plate), tight alignment (tolerance 0.005, 1200 ms), and the specified grasp action parameters (force 20, 800 ms) followed by IsGraspStable, matching the GLOBAL_BT grasp phase.
